body.name: X51 Handheld Game Console 5.0 inch Retro Games Consoles Classic Video Games Built-in Rechargeable Battery Portable Style Pro Gaming Consoles 64GB
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 36 mins
features: 🎮5800+ Slected Classic Games: This X51 game console supports dozens of emulators which covers many types of games, such as adventure, action, racing, etc.
🎮Clear Bright Screen: 5.0-inch display and 800x480 resolution, you can see more details and beautiful scenes in the game.

🎮On The Go Design: Ultra-compact size and old style design, it is very convenient whether you carry it with you during business trips, travel or camping. Recall the dream of the games anytime, anywhere.
🎮Longer Battery Endurance Time: Upgraded 3500mAh li-po battery, it can play for up 3-4 hours on a single charge, let you defeat more game bosses.
🎮Customized Professional System: Exclusive customization console system, English default setted and Save & Load features, no more lost datas and start again, providing excellent gaming experience.
🎮Perfect Gifts for Kids & Nostalgia: This handheld gaming player is a perfect companion to keep your children occupied and improve their hand-eye coordination.
🎮Package List: 1xHandheld Game Console X51, 1xUSB-C Cable, 1xManual, 1x64GB TF-Card(in Console)

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.8 3.8 out of 5 stars 244 ratings 3.8 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheap and everything it's supposed to be
reviews.reviewText: The speaker isn't the best but that's not a deal breaker at such a low price level for entry into handheld emulator systems, especially when there's a built-in headphone jack. All in all feels good in the hands and I can't wait to get some hours on it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Okay Retro Gaming Console
reviews.reviewText: I like that it has multiple games on it but it definitely has some flaws. One thing to take note is that the gaming system does not have the capability to save the game natively. You have to save the state of the game using the built in emulator. Unfortunately, I didn’t find this out until I lost three hours of progress on The Legend of Zelda. Another complaint is that not all games loaded on the system work. For example, the sims game has stuttering that make the game unplayable. Other than those two minor issues the gaming system is very portable and still has a large collection of games for hours of endless fun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best hand held game ever
reviews.reviewText: My husband loves his game and I’m happy because I am the one who found it on line I would recommend this game to others

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DONT BE FOOLED!!! I WASTED 80$!!!
reviews.reviewText: I asked several questions read every question amd answer provided watched reviews and waited before finally buying after thinking on it for 2 weeks now I'm not the most techy guy out there but I wanted to be able to set down relax and be my 10yr old self again but I only bought this for the original first and 2nd series pokemon games I was under the impression that you could save the games especially for the price and it being 2023! But nope I "saved" it atleast 15x literally all to find nothing when I returned after 2hrs of game play there was nothing it wanted to start new game everytime so I went to the "load progress" option on the system itself and there was nothing! Then I find out it has to be saved to the SD card provided........ why don't it automatically do that so how is that done? Please if I'm wrong somone explain to me in clear English and I will retract this bad review but until it's cleared up imo it's one of the reasons I left games alone when they went to online everything it's all about money now smh not about the gamer or the fun and the games.....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The best review you will get.
reviews.reviewText: Excellent first day with this guy. Exceeded my Expectations. Solid build quality. A little bulky but solid. We’ll placed outputs. Except volume and power but doesn’t impede play. Speakers are trash but headphone out is decent. HDMI mini is lame but works. Game collection is fantastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what i expected
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It comes with almost every gameboy advance game and a lot of arcade games i use to play back in the dayI am really enjoying it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Seller please reach out!
reviews.reviewText: Several of the games my daughter and husband tried playing, and either the controls weren't working or the screen went white or displayed pixels.Maybe it's a glitch in the memory card. I tried messaging seller and only got an automated bot.I would have given 5 stars otherwise because this is a good quality game with lots of nostalgic games from my childhood.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This thing rules
reviews.reviewText: I bought it for my son and now I wish I bought it for myself.The games run flawlessly on it. No bogging down or slow emulating.The overall build quality is great. The buttons feel good and the ergonomics of the design is comfortable.Would definitely recommend to anyone.
